module.name: Notification
module.author: Core
module.description: Display messages created in the Notification Drawer of the CMS

property.title: Main Template
property.helpText: The template for formatting your notifications. Enter [Subject] and [Body] with your desired formatting. Enter text or HTML in the box below.

property.title: Snippets
property.helpText: Choose element to add to template

property.title: No data message
property.helpText: A message to display when there are no notifications to show. Enter text or HTML in the box below.

property.title: Age
property.helpText: What is the maximum notification age in minutes, 0 for no restrictions.

property.title: Duration is per item
property.helpText: The duration specified is per item otherwise it is per feed.

property.title: Number of items
property.helpText: The number of items you want to display.

test.message: When duration is per item then number of items must be 1 or higher

property.title: Date Format
property.helpText: The format to apply to all dates returned by the Widget.

property.title: Effect
property.helpText: Please select the effect that will be used to transition between items.

property.title: Speed
property.helpText: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (normal = 1000) or the Marquee Speed in a low to high scale (normal = 1).
